mapper.select: SELECT C.CART_NO , P.PROD_NO , P.PROD_NAME , C.OPT_NO , O.OPT_NAME , O.OPT_ADD_PRICE , O.REMAIN_QTY , C.CART_QTY , P.PROD_PRICE , PA.THUMB_PATH || PA.SAVE_FILE_NAME AS "THUMB_IMG" FROM TB_CART C LEFT JOIN TB_PRODUCT P ON (C.PROD_NO = P.PROD_NO) LEFT JOIN TB_OPTION O ON (C.OPT_NO = O.OPT_NO) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PROD_NO, THUMB_PATH, SAVE_FILE_NAME FROM TB_PRODUCT_ATTACHMENT WHERE (PROD_NO, PROD_ATT_NO) IN ( SELECT PROD_NO, MIN(PROD_ATT_NO) FROM TB_PRODUCT_ATTACHMENT WHERE PROD_ATT_STATUS = 'Y' AND THUMB_PATH IS NOT NULL GROUP BY PROD_NO ) ) PA ON P.PROD_NO = PA.PROD_NO WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY CART_NO DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_CART WHERE CART_NO IN (${cartNo})
